Comments_List: I learned about the relationship between international and domestic politics.
No suggestions. Was a very nice small seminar.
Absolutely, though I don't know when it will be offered again.

Yes, I would recommend this course to anyone interested in the intersections of international relations, comparative politics, and American politics. The course did an excellent job discussing the development of research focusing on the domestic drivers of international politics.
